resources.string: This cute little theater (and I mean little) is tucked away on the ground floor of the Nishi Building that also houses Hotel.
A journey of spice across the county, the Spice Trail will entice you into the delicious world of some of the best cuisine.
Located within the iconic Canberra Centre North Quarter, Dendy Canberra offers you a world-class cinema experience.
What a location!! Once you\'ve worked off dinner by climbing the stairs (oh, there is a lift) you come to an area that has a bars on your left and right.
The best street art in Melbourne - if you are visiting Melbourne I would highly recommend checking out the various alleys and lanes with art.
First time here today for the Scorsese exhibition. Very impressed. Nice spaces here. The exhibition itself was great.
Great cinema if you\'re in the CBD and want to catch a foreign or an indie film.
Fringe World is one of the biggest Fringe Festivals in the world and each year it gets bigger and better.
This is a great little theater very conveniently located in Northbridge - just a few minutes walk from Perth Station and surrounded by lots of bars and restaurants for pre- and post-show options.
Amazing gardens! This place is very large, peaceful and green.

The Art Galley is great to get your culture on. We went this time to the Archibald prize / the line was huge, so buy online (which is what I did whilst in the line). Great art on display, well organised.
